g++   -std=gnu++0x    CMakeFiles/raspi_tracker_ros.dir/raspi_tracker_ros.cpp.o CMakeFiles/raspi_tracker_ros.dir/RaspiCamCV.cpp.o CMakeFiles/raspi_tracker_ros.dir/RaspiCamControl.c.o CMakeFiles/raspi_tracker_ros.dir/RaspiCLI.c.o CMakeFiles/raspi_tracker_ros.dir/read_settings.cpp.o  -o raspi_tracker_ros -rdynamic /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_core.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_util.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_vc_client.so /opt/vc/lib/libvcos.so /opt/vc/lib/libbcm_host.so /opt/vc/lib/libGLESv2.so /opt/vc/lib/libEGL.so -lopencv_gpu -lopencv_contrib -lopencv_legacy -lopencv_objdetect -lopencv_calib3d -lopencv_features2d -lopencv_video -lopencv_highgui -lopencv_ml -lopencv_imgproc -lopencv_flann -lopencv_core -Wl,-rpath,/opt/vc/lib
